author: andreas
content: No I didn't. I don't try B&W routinely, only when I have a problem with colors or think for some reason that it will look better in B&W. Now that you say I did though. You're right. Quite some potential for drama here ðŸ™‚ I've updated the post and, like with all my recent images, you find the full size version in my Flickr photostream.
